website_summaries.verdict: Beautifully designed and thoughtfully put together, this comprehensive set gives our top contenders some healthy competition.
pros: Highly functional with just about every grilling tool imaginable
Constructed from quality stainless steel for superior durability
Lightweight aluminum storage case looks great and makes staying organized a breeze
cons: It's pricey, but it takes care of almost all your grilling utensil requirements

customer_reviews.title: I made the right choice.
customer_reviews.text: I spent hours reading reviews and settled on this set. I'm happy with it. The basting brush coming with two different heads, is nice. We leave the grill brush out with the grill. I bought a 'chefs fork pro' for taking meat temps from Brookstone and it fits perfectly where the grill brush was. Bonus! The spatula and tongs and such seem sturdy. I can't imagine cooking anything these tools couldn't handle. All of the straps were intact and hold everything tight. I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set as a gift for a friend, and would definitely purchase again. The set looked expensive (great when giving as a gift), and after almost a full year of use, is still in great shape. If you're looking for a BBQ tool set, I recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Boot Lover

customer_reviews.title: Must have for all grillers
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were both very impressed with this set. I had just bought him a much more expensive 4 piece set because it had the Steelers logo on them and they were twice the amount of this set. The set comes in a nice and durable case and the pieces themselves are really nice. We haven't had any problems with any of the pieces. Can't wait for warmer weather to use them even more. It's so fancy to open the box up and pull out the tools we need.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could give it more than 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today. I am SO SO impressed. The case itself is awesome. Tools look to be heavy duty and well made. The only possible concern I have is whether the tools will get too hot to handle without gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Walter J Bohrn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but still cant get the old man back at it. Maybe if i put a satellite tv out on the deck.
customer_reviews.text: My hubby was very impressed with this. Although it still hasn't got him away from the tv. I can see now he is already passing the chef hat off to me. Durn and I bought him a electric smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Witts Mini's

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I actually chose the more expensive ones thinking the quality would be better. I foresee the handles detaching...the ends all wobble a little. They are not heavy in your hand so I don't get a good quality feel from them. The corn holders won't ever stay there so expect to find them all over every time you open the case....and my case was broken when it arrived. I got a return with no issues but I plan on looking elsewhere for a set of quality grilling tools.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn from DC

customer_reviews.title: Good Starting set.
customer_reviews.text: This set is okay to get you going but, in the long run you will probably want to get something nicer. The handles to each utensil feel very flimsy and cheap. The handles on my skewers broke only after a few times using them which was a real bust. I also noticed my knife blade doesn't sit straight in its handle. It has this very slight curve to the left. The spatula, fork, tongs, and cleaning brush are all great for what they are but, I really can't imagine them lasting longer than a few years if that.
customer_reviews.author: J. Conquest

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set and case!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. I'm usually the one who grills but I'm hoping with this set, he'll want to do the grilling so I can be the one who mingles with the guests for a change haha I love the case that it came in, it came with everything its supposed to. I will update once he opens it and we get a few used out of the set.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Love this BBQ Grill Set!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because it comes in a nice sturdy case, and everything is neatly organized and held in place by elastic bands that are attached to the case itself. It is a decent size case, and not bulky or burdensome. The actual tools that come in the set are heavy duty and made to last if properly taken care of. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BDexter

customer_reviews.title: Im still giving it 5 stars because I love & cant wait to get the new set
customer_reviews.text: Im trying to return this..... but it wont allow me - can someone from this company please contact me so I can exchange for a new one? Im still giving it 5 stars because I love & cant wait to get the new set. Set is beautiful - but there is damage to the outside container.,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kit interior covered in mold!!
customer_reviews.text: Watch out... I have had this kit for little over a year now. Was a fathers day gift last year. I use it rather often and I last used it a month ago. Today I opened the kit suitcase for a bbq and to my surprise the interior of the suitcase is all rotten. Yes rotten covered in white mold, humid, stinky, and other nasty yellow mold is also there. Just see the picture. Make sure the thing is perfectly dry and closed air tight. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: This product was made very cheaply. The knife was already bent when I first opened the box. The tongs do not line up with each other and you can't grasp a piece of steak or chicken with the tongs. Do Not Order
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Contreras

customer_reviews.title: love this grill set!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty new to grilling, been doing it a few years now... got this set when I first started and it gave me way more than I use. All of the utensils are of good size and pretty well made, the knife is very sharp so be careful. I used the set for around 10 bbq's so far over 2 years.. all the pieces are still in good condition.. I do take care of them and clean them promptly after usage. For the price, I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HSB

customer_reviews.title: sometimes looks do count
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present. The utensils inside look great, hoping the knife is sharp enough. The case though, had a sticker right next to the name on the case. The sticky crap was a b**tch to get off. Also the case is made of what appears as corrugated aluminum sheets. These were not assembled properly and as a result, the case is not flat and pretty like in the picture on the item page.
customer_reviews.author: DMTCR

customer_reviews.title: Just a great product
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding me this is the best gift for a guy I've been married for a while now and I always have a hard time figuring out what the heck I'm going to get for my husband so this year I got him a smoker and I got them this and he absolutely loved it the material is great it's not cheap everything was easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: CrystalS

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Set for the Cost!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a handful of grilling tools and accessories for my husband for Father’s Day, and this Kacebela Grill Tools Set was part of that gift. My husband has been using this set probably 3 times a week for almost the last year and has had zero complaints. The tools are sturdy and will last for years to come. Really impressed by the value, and would definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Great grilling set
customer_reviews.text: I've had this over a year and I have to say this has been a great grilling set of tools. The durability is there, I love the carrying case so I can bring everything I need to the grill. I also have used this same set camping and it performed great. With 19 pieces you basically have a tool for everything you need it for. Can't recommend this enough.
customer_reviews.author: tek233

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought my husband was off his rocker when he bought this, why would anyone need a set that big? He uses it every time he grills and it is of high quality and has lasted over a year. I have been really impressed and can’t wait to look into the brands other products.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and a top performer!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this set. The tools are heavy duty and really work well with our grill. The case is also really nifty too, as I don't have a set grill area where I hook everything. The inside packaging of the case is also really "smart" and the case is heavy duty. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Moeller

customer_reviews.title: Guess it should have been labled differently.  Be careful.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product forbuse for camping. It was supposed to be used-very good condition. Normally that means slight scratches or blemishes. The case was busted up pretty bad. Not sure of its fixable or not. As for contents they looked good and cant wait to use. Just disappointed in Amazon's ranking of very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Decent value for what you pay, knife isn't worth a damn
customer_reviews.text: I got the set mostly for the tongs, spatula, and other things that are hard to fail quality wise, I wouldn't reccomend using the knife unless the purchaser intends to sharpen it themselves, i've seen butter knives with more of an edge than this, it appears to have just been grindered and warped the shape of the entire knife to one side before I even received it. the other quality of the items is decent, not exemplary but you get what you pay for, it's a cheap set to get you buy till you can get yourself a nicer one if you are really interested in grilling
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Case is awful
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product inside is not included in this review...solely because I never made it that far in opening the product. The picture of the case it comes in should explain as much as necessary. It is not even “real” metal case. It appears to be a tape or an insert into the gram which was all bubbles the moment I opened the amazon box. Terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: TSWright

customer_reviews.title: Decent set for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good set of grilling tools. However, the skewer handles fell over after just a couple of uses but are still usable. Also, the corn holders are not sharp enough to puncture the corn. Other than that, the other tools work great and are super useful.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This is a good set, I ordered a similar one last year for my husband, but this one came with the basting brush with silicone type bristles- it was all twisted and bent. And when my item arrived all the items had fallen out of their places. Still a decent buy. The one we got last year was better but is unavailable now...
customer_reviews.author: Jodi V.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cooking Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father for Christmas because he loves cooking. I saw comments about mold so I hesitated, but the one I received didn't have any mold it was clean. It has a really nice case and its sturdy. I thought it look good.
customer_reviews.author: JessB

customer_reviews.title: Skewers broke
customer_reviews.text: Used the skewers to grill some vegetables. The thin attachments at the end of the skewers got burned or melted off in the grill. The case is nice, but the elastic bands are quite difficult to quickly pull tools in and out of. The case, padding, and elastic bands felt cheap, but were still usable. You'll get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wei

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and to keep organized
customer_reviews.text: I've got this on Amazon as a present for my husband with a new grill. He really likes it. The set has everything we need for bbq, no need to go and get extras. I like the case, it helps to organize things. We've been using it for several months and haven't noticed any issues. Well made and nice looking. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skewer handles melt off
customer_reviews.text: Decent set, but the skewer handles are not meant to go on the grill. It is held together by plastic and melted off my first time using it. I was expecting more than plastic for a metal set of bbq tools
customer_reviews.author: matt beckius

customer_reviews.title: Great Tools, Great Price, Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a family member and they loved it. They just got a new house and had a bbq in the back but only had a hodge podge of tools. This was a beautiful set with all the tools together. It comes in a nice box and he used it on the first day we gave it. It worked wonderfully and it comes with an excellent selection of tools. I don't have a bbq grill of my own but I will buy this again for myself when I get one. Would definitely recommend for yourself or as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Abir Noor

customer_reviews.title: Great set for camping
customer_reviews.text: I like this set primarily because it's portable, when we go camping instead of having to hunt down all our grilling supplies they are instead conveniently stored in one lightweight aluminum box, just grab and go. The utensils are a little on the lightweight side as well but so far have been durable in nature. Excellent assortment of grilling gadgets and are held in place by Velcro. Great set of tools.
customer_reviews.author: IHeartArt

customer_reviews.title: Great BBQ Set
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these tools for the past year now and everything that I need (and more) is in this set. The tools have held up very nicely and are still in the same great condition as when I first purchased the set. They look great and I have even gotten compliments on the cool container. All the pieces store easily in the case and it is very organized. I would recommend this product and have already had friends buy it!
customer_reviews.author: David Sheffey

customer_reviews.title: very complete collection
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet, so I cannot comment on the ease of cleaning. However, with this case it is well designed as a gift and the organization is superb. I checked each piece and they appear to be very strongly constructed. Quite nice!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great BBQ Set!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice BBQ set for the money. I would highly recommend for anyone and it would also make for a great housewarming gift. Easy to clean, quality construction, and very easy to store with the included case.
customer_reviews.author: BPotts

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Good quality grill tools, it comes with everything that I need and more! I like that there's a storage/carrying case, it comes in very useful when it comes to putting them away for taking them to time shares. Highly recommended for anyone that grills!
customer_reviews.author: Nate & Amy

customer_reviews.title: Extremely high quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this BBQ Tools Set for over a year now, and I must say it is beyond my expectations. I have gone through several sets, including those purchased a departments stores and hardware stores, but this set does not rust, stain, or scratch easily. The skewers are especially great, with the rubberized handles that do not heat up easily. We have used them for smores, grilled veggies, corn, you name it. I would highly recommend this set, esp given the cost!
customer_reviews.author: TheUrbanNerd

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife. The ones she actually asked for was a different brand. I looked at the other ones and wouldn't have been happy with the quality. So I bought these instead. I paid a little more but these are great. Great quality great feel and comes in a really nice case. I definitely recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Samiam

customer_reviews.title: READY TO GRILL!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Tool Set. Good quality, exactly everything i need for the grill in this sturdy carry all case. Straps hold the tools inside so they don’t bang around. A steal for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: cheryl gray

customer_reviews.title: Grilling Set is everything I need!
customer_reviews.text: I love my grilling kit/set. Every utensil in it has value and the case the set comes in is well built, sleek, and stores conveniently! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: casey r rogers

customer_reviews.title: ... once since the weather here in Iowa hadn't been great for grilling but my husband said it was great ...
customer_reviews.text: We have only used this once since the weather here in Iowa hadn't been great for grilling but my husband said it was great to use and wants to get for his dad to keep in the camper.
customer_reviews.author: 5reis

customer_reviews.title: Set is nice, but missing some pieces upon opening
customer_reviews.text: Got this grill for my dad as a Father's Day gift. Though the quality of the utensils were v nice when he opened it, it was missing a few pieces from the kit, including two of the corn holders and a pair of tongs. Inquired about why I was missing a few of the pieces and never heard back from the company, which seems a bit sketchy. The set itself is 5 stars, but the fact its missing some pieces and the company will not get back to me about those pieces is why I cant rate it higher that 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lia Ploumbis

customer_reviews.title: THIS WILL LAST LONGER THAN YOUR GRILL
customer_reviews.text: MY HUSBAND LOVES THIS SET, IT IS THE BEST SET THAT HE HAS HAD OR SEEN, AND TRUST ME HE HAS HAD MANY. THE QUALITY OF THE UTENSILS ARE TOP NOTCH, BUILT TO LAST. THE CASE THAT THEY COME IN IS BEAUTIFUL, I BELIEVE THIS BAR B QUE SET WILL OUTLAST OUR GRILL.
customer_reviews.author: What Chicago is Lovin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing BBQ Tools Set
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully packaged BBQ Tools set! Purchased for a wedding gift and liked it so much, I plan to order another set for my husband for Father's Day. The tools seem to be great quality, with every BBQ tool you could possibly need (and an extra grill-cleaning brush head). Even liked how it included corn cob holders. The case is nice to have to store the tools in between uses, to keep them all in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda T.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as a gift and was pleasantly surprised by the quality for the price I paid. I would HIGHLY recommend this! We bring it tailgating and could not be happier..the set has everything we always need when cooking on the grill. Again, the quality is GREAT and the fact it came in the case to keep everything secured and together is awesome too. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my nephew. He bought a nice Weber but didn’t have the right tools for it. Everything is sturdy and well made and he and his wife couldn’t be happier using everything included for their Bbq sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny967

customer_reviews.title: Kacebela 19pc BBQ Tools
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice BBQ set, everything you need all in one case. It even has corn skewers which I didn't know it had when I bought it so it was a nice surprise! The knife that came in the set is very sharp and very good to cut meat , however it was a little bent when we received it, so we straightened it out the best we could but it still works great , that would be my only complaint otherwise very nice product and I would recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hayes & Nicole Little

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, and definitely a nice gift idea. However, flimsy, the thongs are crooked, the skewers partially melted. Once used and stained, impossible to get back to the shiny state. Not a great value
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought just the Kacebela brush a while ago, and he LOVED it. So, I had to get this kit for my boyfriend for our anniversary! It's very high quality at a very low price. We love the skewers and corn on the cob holders. Plus, the case lets everything stay together in a convenient spot in the garage!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: what a great grill tool set
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a great grill tool set. More than you thought you needed! Comes in a sleek and sturdy case. All the tools are easy and comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: kim8613

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BBQ SET
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my future son in law. He ABSOLUTELY loved it. Said he had never had such a nice set as this before. And a great case to keep everything in. Heavy set. It was a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Denise B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Product is sturdy, easy to clean, and the carrying case they come in is really nice! Makes it feel like it's much more expensive! Highly reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Really fancy looking
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be made well, the quality is high. Bought this as a gift for my husband and he is not one bit disappointed. He said it's really fancy looking!
customer_reviews.author: DolceSmile

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first usage.
customer_reviews.text: The glue inside the skewers does not stand up to the heat of a grill. On the first use, the skewers literally fell apart, the handle separating from the skewer. Don't buy this unless you want to run the risk of having searing hot metal and food hit you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty good grill set. I didn’t think we’d use everything it it ( we bought it mostly for the long handle tools) but the corn holders did get used! Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: CCH

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift for Husband
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my husband's birthday. He loves it! The tools are durable and unlike a lot of other kits, everything in this case is useful. They were also very easy to clean. The tools and very sturdy and dangerous (extremely sharp edges). So I'm very glad that it came with this case.
customer_reviews.author: Trina V

customer_reviews.title: Shop around for cheeper price
customer_reviews.text: Paid to much for it. There are other sets just like it for cheeper. Shop around. It’s good over all. You can tell it was cheaply made especially the corn holders. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Alan amity

customer_reviews.title: Good set for core tools!
customer_reviews.text: We got this set to get us everything we needed to start grilling and are very happy with the quality of the tools. The only items that do not seem to be of strong quality would be the corn holders and the kebab holders. The corn holders bent when we tried to use them. They were not sharp enough to push into the cob. Even so, the other tools were more than worth the value.
customer_reviews.author: scheblerc

customer_reviews.title: Father’s Day is coming must have
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to hubby as a gift he loves it and now we are camping a lot it comes in handy to have along with the compact case to keep all of the items organized definitely recommended item for a man who likes to grill!!!!
customer_reviews.author: verrasi

customer_reviews.title: Super cool
customer_reviews.text: Super cool nice stuff good quality we already use one time best thing ever and I love case little bag
customer_reviews.author: yaren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I love how many pieces and accessories this comes with, it made a wonderful gift the recipient was very happy with! The quality seems good, although some of the pieces may be smaller than serious grillers may prefer. Can't beat the value though!
customer_reviews.author: illuminated1111

customer_reviews.title: Awesome BBQ Set
customer_reviews.text: This set has everything that you need to cook up some great food on your grill. Very happy with the quality of the utensils and the storage case. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: P. Kott

customer_reviews.title: Great kit. There was a couple of mini loose ...
customer_reviews.text: Great kit. There was a couple of mini loose screws in the box but it was no big deal. Gave it to the husband as a gift he took it straight to our camper for the summer. Happy with the buy
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Newton

customer_reviews.title: This set is very durable and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these sets for Christmas. One for our neighbor who is an avid grill master and we kept the other. Our neighbor loved his and we loved ours as well It is durable, beautiful, and functional. The container makes it easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a BBQ person
customer_reviews.text: This set was bigger than I thought. The tools are well made. The case is light, not heavy at all. Easy to carry around. When I opened the case the corn on the cob holders were everywhere, but nothing was damaged and I put them right back in their holders.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: It looks really nice when you pull it out in front of guess ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for someone who loves to bbq. It looks really nice when you pull it out in front of guess while cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my uncle for Xmas as he is the king of bbq in the family. Can't wait for the summer time for him to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Tweety05

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a nice tool set
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a nice tool set. Fast shipping. Got it for my husbands birthday. Won't get to use much until summer though.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sauce
customer_reviews.text: I love the container the utensils came in. The brush is very strong and the tongs worked like magic. Some of the smaller stuff I won’t use very often but nice to have when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A Herzfeld

customer_reviews.title: great value for your money!
customer_reviews.text: got this for my boyfriend for christmas, he loves it & uses it very often, says it’s the nicest one he’s ever owned
customer_reviews.author: gianna

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my boyfriend and he absolutely loved it. It's very well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend and he absolutely loved it. It's very well made, sturdy and look beautiful. He loves it so much that he even washes them right after he's done grilling to keep them beautiful. Very impressed with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the son-in-laws, for Christmas. They were a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: William Patterson

customer_reviews.title: The handles melted very quick, need to avoid the ...
customer_reviews.text: The handles melted very quick, need to avoid the handles from the heat and fire especially the skewers, we lost 4 of them by the heat of the grill
customer_reviews.author: Samar Sidky Martin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gift, Durable, and still in great shape
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband, a serious griller, and he loves this set. The case is sturdy and is a great storage for the tools. They are durable stainless steel and wash great in the dishwasher. I gave this over a year ago and it is still looking great.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Grill Sey
customer_reviews.text: This Grill set was exactly what I needed. It does a great job with chicken, steak and just about anything you can put on the grill. I would highly recommend this set to anyone would needs one personally or wants to give it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: William wold

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is an affordable, all around grill set that covers most of my needs. One drawback is that I see some rust forming on the grill brush right after I had cleaned it in my dishwasher (see pics).
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great looking set
customer_reviews.text: Has everything you need to grill except the food !
customer_reviews.author: ricardo garcia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good product for the money. I gifted my boyfriend this set for his birthday and he uses it quite often. The only drawback are that 8 of the 19 pieces are corn holders, which we've found to be ineffective because of the large size and dullness of the prongs meant to enter the corn. We are satisfied with everything else.
customer_reviews.author: nadejda

customer_reviews.title: Metal can melt. Okay
customer_reviews.text: The tongs are hard to pick things up with. DO NOT USE THE SKEWERS! I put some shrimp on the skewers and put it in the grill... the metal started to melt. It was horrible!
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this grill set. The tools are high quality and the case is very handy. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty quality utensils.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set that I have used a few times. The only bad is that the felt backing that holds up the stuff came unglued. It was easy to fix. Still worth what I paid for it and will have it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Marin

customer_reviews.title: Some great parts, some not so great...
customer_reviews.text: Tongs, spatula, and baster are all great, but the corn cob holders wouldn’t stay in the cob, and the kebab skewer handles fell out after one use on the grill... the handles weren’t even over the flame! Some kind of rubber material inside the handle started to melt and the skewers fell completely out of the handle...
customer_reviews.author: Brandon R Vest

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking set. The case is nice but made of cheaper materials but for the purchase price it’s pretty magnificent. Has all the right utensils to please a grilling grandmaster.
customer_reviews.author: Marian Agbatah

customer_reviews.title: Damaged case
customer_reviews.text: The case was damaged when I received this package. Case had scratches, dents and even the coating was peeling off on one side. Once the case was opened, it appears someone had gone through it, many of the various items were not held in their designated spot. It literally looked like a beat up old case with a bunch of BBQ equipment thrown in it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Great travel grill set. Game changer is the long knife. Needs sharpening.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set for price!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of grill utensils ! Had for over a year now and still like new , comes with a nice carrying case as well, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Terrible smell
customer_reviews.text: The tool are pretty cheaply made and the case smelled Musty and mildewy!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality set at a Great place
customer_reviews.text: The set is priced very reasonably and has served me well for almost a year so far. It contains just about any grilling tool you may need and is definitely made of good quality. The customer service really aims to make sure you are satisfied as well. I would recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap feeling, returned. Did gave a variety of tools with a nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Sara H.

customer_reviews.title: Clean looking and versatile.
customer_reviews.text: Great for grilling season! Worked great for my husband’s birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great material, great variety
customer_reviews.text: Was bought for a gift, Great material, great variety, 100% recomended.
customer_reviews.author: Marilian

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had a chance to use them a few times since we just moved in towards the end of grilling season, but they worked great! Very durable and come in a nice case for storage.
customer_reviews.author: SClark

customer_reviews.title: Nice and durable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and durable set, my dad grills a lot and loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: A+ for Style / B- for Quality
customer_reviews.text: Update: Dropping to four stars because skewers fell apart after a few uses on the grill. They couldn't handle grill heat and they literally melted apart. Looks good and cleans up well.
customer_reviews.author: Anders Goranson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent BBQ Set - Held Up Well All Year
customer_reviews.text: We got our set last year, and have used them utensils all summer, fall, and winter. All the pieces held up well outside, even during the winter here in Idaho, when we left them outside in the weather. We barbecue every weekend, and set still looks like it's brand new. Everything cleans up well in the dishwasher. The case is of good quality as well, and is good for our camping trips to the mountains.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Kohout

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TOOLS, STYLISH CASE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this BBQ Tools Set as a wedding shower gift. The recipient was pleased with it. She and her husband are looking forward to grilling with these tools.
customer_reviews.author: 3GIRLSMOM

customer_reviews.title: 19 piece BBQ grill tool set
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my son for a gift and he thought they were a very nice quality set.
customer_reviews.author: hoppy

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality.. just don't leave the grill cleaner out in the rain
customer_reviews.author: D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Case looks good and the items inside are very good. I like the fact that I can keep my BBQ cooking utensils separate from my inside cooking utensils. Good quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fits in a stainless case, which I am able to keep outside under my grill. great storage within the case and it has all the tools I need for my day-to-day grilling needs. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: drumsdci

customer_reviews.title: The Answer for the Grill
customer_reviews.text: All the tools one could need in one container. I love this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Wood

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Items do not do well in heat, metal U shaped ends melt off really easy.
customer_reviews.author: chris benjamin

product_meta.title: Grill Tool Set, Kacebela BBQ Tools, Grill Utensil Set with Storage Case for Outdoor Barbecue Grilling (Stainless Steel,19-Piece)
feature_bullets: Complete grill tools - spatula, tong, fork, knife, basting brush, grill brush, replacement brush head, 8 corn holders, 4 skewers, basting brush
Premium Quality - All grill tools are made from food grade stainless steel, resists heat and rust, dishwasher safe, let you enjoy grilling or barbecue worry-free

Humanization design: the Elongated handles keep your hands from getting singed from the heat, handle rings design for easy hanging, Aluminum case keep grilling tools neatly organized and better protected during the off-season

Perfect grilling gifts - this lightweight BBQ utensils set is perfect for indoor or outdoor cooking, baking or grilling. An ideal GIFT FOR Father's day, birthdays, Christmas, wedding showers, as a housewarming present, and etc.
What You Get: 19pc barbecue tool set, 45 Days Money Back and 12 Months manufacturer warranty. Package size: 9. 8 by 3. 1 by 17. 5 inches

Notes: The skewer sticks are not designed to use on barbeque grill directly. Please roast all your foods on the grid before you set them onto the skewers. You can put the skewers on the grill to keep the goods warm but not apply direct heat.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars587 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
